TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEndpointBehavior

summary.span: 實作可用於延伸服務或用戶端應用程式中端點的執行階段行為的方法。

span.span: Implements methods that can be used to extend run-time behavior for an endpoint in either a service or client application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以實作 介面，以在用戶端或服務應用程式的應用程式層級修改、檢查或延伸端點執行的某些方面。Implement the interface to modify, examine, or extend some aspect of endpoint-wide execution at the application level for either client or service applications. - 您可以使用 方法在執行階段傳遞自訂資料，讓繫結可支援自訂行為。Use the method to pass custom data at runtime to enable bindings to support custom behavior. - 您可以使用 方法在用戶端應用程式中修改、檢查或插入延伸至端點。Use the method to modify, examine, or insert extensions to an endpoint in a client application. - 您可以使用 方法在服務應用程式中修改、檢查或插入延伸至端點執行。Use the method to modify, examine, or insert extensions to endpoint-wide execution in a service application. - 您可以使用 方法來確認 符合特定需求。Use the method to confirm that a meets specific requirements. 這可以用於確保端點已啟用特定的組態設定，支援特定功能和其他需求。This can be used to ensure that an endpoint has a certain configuration setting enabled, supports a particular feature and other requirements. 物件可以利用其中任何一種方法，但通常只有一種是重要的；在這種情況下，未使用的方法不需執行動作就可以傳回。 objects can make use of any of these methods, but often only one is important; in such cases, the unused methods can return, performing no action. > [!NOTE] > 所有的 方法都會傳遞 物件做為參數。All of the methods pass a object as a parameter. 這個參數僅供檢查之用；如果您修改 物件，執行行為就會變成未定義狀態。This parameter is for examination only; if you modify the object the execution behavior is undefined. 物件通常用於存取服務應用程式中 、、 和 物件的各種不同屬性，以及用戶端應用程式中的 和 。 objects are typically used to access the various properties of the , , , and objects in a service application and the and in a client application. 此外，您可以使用 和 屬性分別存取雙工用戶端和服務的屬性。In addition, you can access the properties of duplex clients and services using the and properties, respectively. 如需各種可用屬性和自訂的說明，請參閱 < [ 擴充 ServiceHost 與服務模型層](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/extending-servicehost-and-the-service-model-layer.md)。For a description of the various properties and customizations available, see [Extending ServiceHost and the Service Model Layer](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/extending-servicehost-and-the-service-model-layer.md). 一旦決定自訂 （並視需要實作自訂介面） 和已決定適當的自訂範圍，將自訂必須插入 Windows 通訊Foundation (WCF) 執行階段藉由實作並將端點行為加入至執行階段。Once a customization has been decided upon (and the customization interface implemented if necessary) and the has been decided is the appropriate scope of customization, the customization must be inserted into the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) runtime by implementing and adding the endpoint behavior to the runtime. 有兩種方法可將行為加入至執行階段：There are two ways to add the behavior to the runtime: - 在開啟服務主機 (服務應用程式中) 或通道處理站 (用戶端應用程式中) 之前，以程式設計的方式將自訂端點行為加入至 屬性。Programmatically add the custom endpoint behavior to the property prior to the opening of the service host (in a service application) or the channel factory (in a client application). - 使用應用程式組態檔來設定行為。Configure the behavior using an application configuration file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ <behaviorExtensions>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behaviorextensions.md)。For details, see [<behaviorExtensions>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behaviorextensions.md). 若要執行預定的服務自訂工作，則必須在建構服務執行階段之前將 物件加入至 屬性，這個執行階段會在針對 呼叫 方法時發生。To perform the service customization task for which it is intended, the object must be added to the property prior to the construction of the service runtime, which occurs when method is called on . 若要執行用戶端自訂工作，則必須在針對 呼叫 方法或 方法之前，先將 物件加入至 屬性。To perform a client customization task, the object must be added to the property before calling the method or the method on . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範將 物件新增至服務應用程式的端點行為的實作。The following code example shows the implementation of an endpoint behavior that adds an object in a service application. 在這種情況中，`EndpointBehaviorMessageInspector` 類別會實作 以檢查傳入和傳出訊息、 介面將偵測器類別插入套用此行為的所有端點的檢查系統，以及 以使用應用程式組態檔來啟用訊息偵測器行為。In this case, the `EndpointBehaviorMessageInspector` class implements to inspect the inbound and outbound message, the interface to insert the inspector class into the inspection system for all endpoints to which the behavior applies, and the to enable the message inspector behavior using an application configuration file. 第一個步驟是實作訊息偵測器。The first step is to implement the message inspector. [!code-csharp[IEndpointBehavior#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/iendpointbehavior/cs/iendpointbehaviormessageinspector.cs#2)] 下一個程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法將訊息偵測器加入 屬性。The next code example shows the use of the method to add the message inspector to the property. [!code-csharp[IEndpointBehavior#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/iendpointbehavior/cs/iendpointbehaviormessageinspector.cs#4)] 下列程式碼範例會示範 的實作，以便從組態檔啟用訊息偵測器行為。The following code example shows the implementation of in order to enable use of the message inspector behavior from a configuration file. [!code-csharp[IEndpointBehavior#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/iendpointbehavior/cs/iendpointbehaviormessageinspector.cs#3)] 最後，下列組態檔會顯示可以如何從組態來使用前面的範例。Finally, the following configuration file shows how the preceding example can be used from configuration. [!code-xml[IEndpointBehavior#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/iendpointbehavior/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddBindingParameters(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection bindingParameters) cil managed
Public Sub AddBindingParameters (endpoint As ServiceEndpoint, bindingParameters As BindingParameterCollection)

param.name: bindingParameters
param.span: 繫結項目支援行為所需的物件。

span.span: The objects that binding elements require to support the behavior.

summary.span: 您可以實作這個方法，在執行階段將資料傳遞至繫結，以支援自訂行為。

span.span: Implement to pass data at runtime to bindings to support custom behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以實作 方法，為繫結項目提供支援端點行為所需要的額外物件。Implement the method to provide binding elements with the extra objects they require to support the endpoint behavior. 如果在此處加入繫結參數，當建立通道接聽程式或通道處理站時，繫結可以找出這些物件。When binding parameters are added here the binding can locate these objects when the channel listener or channel factory is created. 一般而言，您會實作 方法將有關端點的資訊傳遞至自訂繫結項目，以便能夠正確建置支援通道。Typically, you implement the method to pass information about the endpoint to a custom binding element so that it can build a supporting channel correctly. 如果不需要修改，則不會傳回值。Return no value if no modifications are required.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ApplyClientBehavior(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint, class System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime clientRuntime) cil managed

span.span: The endpoint that is to be customized.

param.name: clientRuntime
param.span: 要自訂的用戶端執行階段。

span.span: The client runtime to be customized.

summary.span: 實作端點上用戶端的修改或延伸。

span.span: Implements a modification or extension of the client across an endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以實作 方法，以在搭配端點的所有訊息上或針對特定作業檢視、修改或將自訂延伸加入至用戶端執行階段。Implement the method to view, modify, or add custom extension to the client runtime across all messages used with an endpoint or for specific operations. 如需有關您可以使用用戶端執行階段物件進行何種自訂的詳細資訊，請參閱 和 。For details about what customizations you can do with a client run-time object, see and . 如果行為只預定用於服務應用程式，建議使用 方法擲回 。It is recommended that the method throw a if the behavior is only intended for use in a service application. 由於其他行為可能已經加入或從執行階段移除某些作業，因此不保證描述中的作業數目和 屬性中的 物件相同。Because other behaviors may have already added or removed some operations from the runtime there is no guarantee that there are the same number of operations in the description as there are objects in the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ApplyDispatchBehavior(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint, class System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher endpointDispatcher) cil managed

span.span: The endpoint that exposes the contract.

param.name: endpointDispatcher
param.span: 要修改或延伸的端點發送器。

span.span: The endpoint dispatcher to be modified or extended.

summary.span: 實作端點上服務的修改或延伸。

span.span: Implements a modification or extension of the service across an endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以實作 方法，以在所有訊息上或針對端點中的特定作業檢視、修改或延伸服務執行階段。Implement the method to view, modify, or extend the service runtime across all messages or for specific operations in an endpoint. 如需您可以在服務應用程式中執行何種自訂的詳細資訊，請參閱 和 。For details about what customizations you can do in a service application, see and . 如果行為只預定用於用戶端應用程式，建議使用 方法擲回 例外狀況。It is recommended that the method throw a exception if the behavior is only intended for use in a client application. 請注意，當使用回呼合約時，描述中可以有兩個相同名稱的作業 (每個方向一個)。Note that there can be two operations with the same name in the description when using a callback contract (one operation in each direction). 如果您正在逐一查看作業，必須聯結端點 和由 屬性傳回的項目之間的訊息方向。If you are iterating through operations, you must correlate the message direction between the endpoint and what is returned by the property. 此外，由於其他行為可能已經加入或從執行階段移除某些作業，因此不保證描述中的作業數目和 屬性中的 物件相同。In addition, because other behaviors may have already added or removed some operations from the runtime, there is no guarantee that there are the same number of operations in description as there are objects in the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範將 物件新增至服務應用程式的端點行為的實作。The following code example shows the implementation of an endpoint behavior that adds an object in a service application. 在這種情況中，`EndpointBehaviorMessageInspector` 類別會實作 以檢查傳入和傳出訊息、 介面將偵測器類別插入套用此行為的所有端點的檢查系統，以及 以使用應用程式組態檔來啟用訊息偵測器行為。In this case, the `EndpointBehaviorMessageInspector` class implements to inspect the inbound and outbound message, the interface to insert the inspector class into the inspection system for all endpoints to which the behavior applies, and the to enable the message inspector behavior using an application configuration file. 第一個步驟是實作訊息偵測器。The first step is to implement the message inspector. [!code-csharp[IEndpointBehavior#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/iendpointbehavior/cs/iendpointbehaviormessageinspector.cs#2)] 下一個程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法將訊息偵測器加入 屬性。The next code example shows the use of the method to add the message inspector to the property. [!code-csharp[IEndpointBehavior#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/iendpointbehavior/cs/iendpointbehaviormessageinspector.cs#4)] 下列程式碼範例會示範 的實作，以便從組態檔啟用訊息偵測器行為。The following code example shows the implementation of in order to enable use of the message inspector behavior from a configuration file. [!code-csharp[IEndpointBehavior#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/iendpointbehavior/cs/iendpointbehaviormessageinspector.cs#3)] 最後，下列組態檔會顯示可以如何從組態來使用前面的範例。Finally, the following configuration file shows how the preceding example can be used from configuration. [!code-xml[IEndpointBehavior#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/iendpointbehavior/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Validate(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint) cil managed

summary.span: 您可以實作這個方法以確認端點符合某些預定的準則。

span.span: Implement to confirm that the endpoint meets some intended criteria.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以實作 方法來檢查結構，以確認任何一組條件。Implement the method to examine the structure to confirm any set of criteria. 使用這個方法，不需要在 或 中執行任何自訂。It is not necessary to perform any customizations in or to make use of this method. 如果端點通過驗證，就會傳回，否則會擲回例外狀況。If the endpoint passes validation, return; otherwise, throw an exception. 例如， 方法可用於確保所有的端點都使用經過認可的企業繫結。For example, the method can be use to ensure that all endpoints use an approved corporate binding.
